title: problem with mastery tokens
body: iv had many games where my champ. is mastery level 5 at the end of a game i get an s rank but it doesnt give me a token for level 6 can enyone tell me why please  ?

replies.body: Congrats on your S ranks!  You'll actually have to already start a match at level 5 to earn a token.  It's not possible to both reach 5 and receive a token in the same match.  Let me know if that clears things up!
thanks but you got it wrong i was alredy mastery lv 5 but still didnt give me tokens

That's odd!  Toss me some more info like the champion you were playing and when the match was.  Was it in Summoner's Rift?  Per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, other map modes currently do not reward tokens.

map:the crystal scar 
champ: jhin s rank
mod: ascension
stat: 25/13/22
mastery level: 5
mastery points: 58753
That would do it!  Since the match was in Ascension, you weren't able to earn tokens.  You'll have to join Summoner's Rift for eligibility.  Hope that helps, and good luck!
thanks and sorry for the worry
